metadata.title: USN-5134-1 -- Docker vulnerability
metadata.description: An information disclosure issue was discovered in the command line interface of Docker. A misconfigured credential store could result in supplied credentials being leaked to the public registry, when using the docker login command with a private registry.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5134-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  golang-github-docker-docker-dev - 20.10.7-0ubuntu5~18.04.3 docker.io - 20.10.7-0ubuntu5~18.04.3 golang-docker-dev - 20.10.7-0ubuntu5~18.04.3 vim-syntax-docker - 20.10.7-0ubuntu5~18.04.3 docker-doc - 20.10.7-0ubuntu5~18.04.3 No subscription required
